title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with product management, shopping cart, payment processing, and order tracking.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, task assignment, and progress tracking.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard that displays current conditions and forecasts for multiple locations with interactive maps.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A mobile-responsive fitness tracking application that allows users to log workouts and track progress over time.

title: Recipe Finder
description: A web application that helps users find recipes based on ingredients they have available.
